course_description: This course provides students the opportunity to become involved in a personalized approach to health and well-being by sharing with peers strategic approaches for the implementation of a healthy lifestyle. Offered Yearly. Repeatable for up to Twelve Semester Hours.
prerequisites: HLTH 200 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
